ohu samariye sita awurudu dahahathak palanaya kaleya. 2 namuth ohu yehowa dewi pilikul kala kriya digatama kaleya.+ eeshrayelwarunwa papayata pelambaawu+ nebathge puth yerobowam kala papayen walaki sitinawa+ wenuwata ohu digatama ema papaye niyaluneya. 3 ebawin yehowa dewi eeshrayel senanga samanga mahath se udahas wi+ siriyawe raju wu hasayelge athatath+ hasayelge puth ben-hadadge athatath+ eeshrayelwarunwa kihipa wathawakma hasu wimata idahariyeya. 4 pasuwa yehoyahash raju yehowa dewita kannalaw kala nisa yehowa dewige udahasa pahawa giyeya.+ dewi yehoyahash rajuta sawan dunneya.+ manda siriyawe raju nisa eeshrayel senanga addutu pida ohu dutuweya.+ 5 ebawin eeshrayelwarunwa siriyanu jathikayangen galawaganimata yehowa dewi galawumkaruweku ewweya.+ inpasu pera men thama thamange niweswalata wi samakamiwa jiwath wimata eeshrayelwarunta haki wiya.+ 6 namuth eeshrayelwaru thamanwa kalin papayata pelambaawu+ yerobowam raju kala papawalin walaki sitinawa wenuwata digatama ema papawala niyalunoya.+ boru namaskaraya sandaha idi kala kuluna+ pawa samariye daknata thibuneya. 7 yehoyahash rajuta ithuru wuye asaruwan panasdenekuth ashwa ratha dahayakuth pabala hamudawe bhatayan dasadahasakuth pamani.+ manda kamathe paga damana bol men+ owunwa sahamulinma winasha kara damimata siriyawe raja katayuthu kara thibina.+ 8 yehoyahash rajuge jiwithaye anikuth siduwim ganada ohu kala dewal ha ohuge balawath kriya ganada eeshrayelhi rajawarunge ithihasaya wartha kara athi liyawillehi sandahan kara thibe.+ 9 kalak gatha wu pasu yehoyahash rajuda miya giya athara ohuge muthunmiththan men ohuwada thanpath karana ladi.

adu pahasukamwalin yuktha pasal sisun 180,000kata kiri pakattuwak bagin labadimata thiranaya kara thibe.ee anuwa litar 150 pramanayen yukthawa kiri pakat pasalwalata labadimata niyamitha athara mema kiri pakattuwak dina 30k thaba ganimata hakiwima wisheshathwayak weyi.pasal sisun sandaha kiri widuruwak labadima thulin kriyakari daru parapurak bihi kirima rajaye apekshawa anuwa 2013 ayawaya yojanawalata samagamiwa me thiranaya rajaya gena thibe.me wadapiliwela anuwa 2014 warshaya purawata laksha 2 bagin prathipadana rajaya salasa athi athara ee sandaha rajaya ha milko samagama athara giwisumakata elambaimata da idiriyedi niyamithaya..
thibena li, pol katu aadiya li tika manala, kali kapala, ekata muttu karanawa.

namuth 2015 aprel 06 wenida shanthi kumar, gajan kumar, dedena ath adanguwata gena kotuwa mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kirime di pradhana sakakaru tiran alas bawa polisiya wisin adhikaranayata karunu wartha kara thibe. 2015 aprel 07 wenida sita 2015 mayi 19 wenida dakwa tiran alaswa ath adanguwata ganima sandaha polisiya wisin nithipathi upades illa siti athara 2015 mayi 19 wenida ohu ath adanguwata ganna lesa nithipathi upades dun namuth ohuwa ath adanguwata nogannayi shreshtadhikaranayen polisiyata nothisi labina. 2015 mayi 27 dina adhikaranaye karunu dakwana lada bawath, 2015 agosthu 05 wenida likhitha deshana bara dun bawath kiyamin 2015 sapthambar 02 da agawinisuru thuma, eewa wanasundara, rohini marasinha yana thripudgala shreshtadhikarana winisuruwarun wisin athuru thahanam niyogayak laba demin tiran alas ath adanguwata ganima walakwana ladi inpasu 2016 agosthu 23 da nawathath mahadhikaranaye naduwa kandawana lada awasthawedi shreshtadhikaranaye niyogayak nomathi bawin 2016 agosthu 29 weni da shreshtadhikaranaye niyogaya anuwa adhi chodana pathra bara ganimata katayuthu karana bawa tiran alas athulu withthiye parshawaya danwana ladi.

kathuwaraya ee kerehi da salakilla dakwa thibe.afghanisthanaya sthri hinsanayata ha gruhastha prachandathwayata nam dara athi rajyayeki. 2010 agosthu 09 tayim sangarawe kawaraye katha wa thula satahan wuye afghan gamaka tharuna kanthawakage nasaya mulumanin ma kapa dama athi kathandarayak gana ya.me siduwima lokawadhanayata lak wu athara prakata samaja widyagnyayo kihipa denek sthri hinsanaya gana wiwrutha adahas dak wu ha.owunge mathaya ta anuwa sthri hinsanaya prachalithawimata balapa pradhana sadhaka kihipayak thibe.

"duhn..."wishala shabdayakin mata aharuna.man wisal karagaththa das walin hima diha baluwa.eyath aharala ma diha bala hitiye biya musu wu muhunin.api ekinekage muhunu desa bala sitiye eya aththatama asunada nathnam peradina rathriye wage mayawakda kiya nishchaya karaganimatayi.miniththu kihipayak nihadawa gewi giya.wassa nawathi thibuna namuth widuli ketim ha sihin gerawili nawathi thibune na.janelaya asalin bassekuge musala kagasimakuth apata asune age hirigadu pipawamin.api ada matha idagena ekineka wetha lan wuna.bassa nonawathwa musala lesa kagasuwa.janelaye widuru walin athulata warthanaya wu widuli eli wiwidha bhutha rata kamaraya thula mawwe apa hadawath thawath biyata path karaminuyi.
